reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: ICI project to improve the protection of the Egyptian cultural heritage

description.narrative: The Finnish Environment Institute is planning an ICI project with the Egyptian Supreme Council of Antiquities (SCA) in order to improve the protection of the Egyptian cultural heritage. The aim of the project is to improve SCA's capacity to use maintain an d update the Egyptian Antiquities Information System that includes valuable geographic information concerning the exact location of Egypt's historically and archaeologically significant sites. The project is based on the previous EAIS -project between Egyp t and Finland in 2000-2007 during which the entire system was created.
